Ekadamsaniya Thera：An arahant．

In the time of Atthadassī Buddha，he was named Nārada-Kesava．He heard the Buddha preach and，gladdened by the sermon，did him homage．

Seventeen kappas ago he became a king under the name of Amittatāpana （v.l．Amittavāsana?） （Ap.i.168f）．

He is probably identical with Pavittha Thera．ThagA.i.185.
